metadata.title: CVE-2021-31439 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to execute arbitrarycode on affected installations of Synology DiskStation Manager.Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerablity. The specificflaw exists within the processing of DSI structures in Netatalk. The issueresults from the lack of proper validation of the length of user-supplieddata prior to copying it to a heap-based buffer. An attacker can leveragethis vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.Was ZDI-CAN-12326.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-31439` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

netatalk - 3.1.12~ds-9ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netatalk package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.12~ds-9ubuntu0.22.04.1').
